name: Garden City Amusement Park

name: Rivers State Cultural Centre
description: A vibrant center dedicated to promoting and preserving the diverse cultural heritage of Rivers State through art, music, and dance.

name: Port Harcourt Zoo

description: Home to a variety of indigenous and exotic animal species, offering an educational and entertaining experience for visitors of all ages.

name: Mile One Market
